name: 陳立憲
objective:
基礎工程係應用土壤力學之原理於基礎問題之分析，其內容包括下列各項：(1)基礎之定義：功用及其重要性、(2)土壤調查、(3)基礎之水、防水及開挖、(4)基礎之承載力、5)基礎之應力分析與沈陷計算(6)基腳及筏式基礎、(7)樁基、(8)墩基、(9)沈箱基礎、(10)基礎穩定處理。
Subsurface investigations and synthesis of soil parameters for geotechnical design and analysis,concepts of shallow and deep foundation design,geotechnical design of conventional retaining walls,computerized analysis and design of soil/foundation interaction;case histories.
schedule:
Wk. 1. Introduction
Wk. 2 Review (土壤之剪力強度: 直(接)剪(力)、三軸(間接)試驗) ch. 10
Wk. 3-5 邊坡穩定: 有限、無限邊坡 ch. 14 (自然邊坡)
Wk. 6-7 側向土壓: 主動、被動破壞 ch. 12 (人工邊坡)
Wk. 8 Flipped Classroom -- Project Presentation
Wk. 9 Mid-term Exam.
Wk. 10-12 淺 基 礎: 強度、沉陷控制 ch. 11
Wk. 13 Flipped Classroom -- Project Presentation
Wk. 14- 16 深 基 礎: 單樁、群樁分析 ch. 15
Wk. 17 Flipped Classroom -- Project Presentation
             其他: 地下調查 (工址調查)  ch.10 & 擋土、橫撐分析
Wk. 18 Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
Homework assignment & Quizs (30%)
Mid-term Exam. 35 %
Final Exam. 35 %
materials: Fundamentals of Geotechnical Engineering, by B. M. Das, 5th ed., 2012
